name: Another Place (Saidus)
description:
A short and simple game about a little character who went to an unfamiliar place and tries to escape and parkour! Help the character from escaping the obstacles and reach to the end!

This game was made for a game jam! I hope you liked it! :D

Instructions:

(A) - to go left.

(D) - to go right.

or Arrow Keys

(W) - to go next level or to go up a ladder.

(Space bar) - to Jump.
